forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn graces Downtown San Francisco, a gentle haze softens the outlines of the city. The current temperature settles comfortably around the low fifties, while a light north-northeast breeze whispers through the streets, offering a refreshing touch of coolness. Despite the night's cloud cover, a promise of clarity emerges for the day ahead, with the forecast hinting at a partly sunny disposition. The high near sixty-five will wrap the city in a mild embrace, perfect for a variety of activities.

While a few clouds linger, the essence of the day leans toward pleasantness rather than gloom. As the sun climbs higher, temperatures will dip slightly in the afternoon, inviting wearers of light layers to indulge in comfortable strolls down Market Street or a leisurely visit to one of the many quaint cafes. Perhaps one might find solace in a quiet corner of Golden Gate Park, warmed by the gentle sun breaking through the clouds. A light jacket would serve well, giving you just enough comfort as the marine layer dances along the coastline, hinting at its presence without imposing upon the day's serenity. Whether you choose to explore scenic vistas or savor a book outdoors, the day unfolds with inviting possibilities amidst the gentle rhythms of the city.
